subject: Re: Junitreport doesn't work with ant 1.6.2
msgSnippet: ... You need to upgrade your installation of Xalan; the JUnitReport stylesheet included in Ant 1.6.2 requires Xalan 2.4+. The easiest way to do this is to
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Sadaf_Choudhry" <sadaf_choudhry@i...>
wrote:
> Hi,
> I just upgraded to ant 1.6.2

> Can anyone tell me what I am missing?

You need to upgrade your installation of Xalan; the JUnitReport
stylesheet included in Ant 1.6.2 requires Xalan 2.4+.

The easiest way to do this is to upgrade your JVM; a 1.4.2 series will
work fine.

For more info, see my notes on this bug:
http://twasink.net/blog/archives/2004/07/ant_162_junitre_1.html
